member.name: CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT
member.summary: The CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT structure contains an array of simple certificate chains and a trust status structure that indicates summary validity data on all of the connected simple chains.

member.name: CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

member.name: CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT.TrustStatus
member.summary: A structure that indicates the combined trust status of the simple chains array. The structure includes an error status code and an information status code. For information about status code values, see.

member.name: CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT.cChain
member.summary: The number of simple chains in the array.

member.name: CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT.rgpChain
member.summary: An array of pointers to simple chain structures. rgpChain[0] is the end certificate simple chain, and rgpChain[cChain–1] is the final chain. If the end certificate is to be considered valid, the final chain must begin with a certificate contained in the root store or an otherwise trusted, self-signed certificate. If the original chain begins with a trusted certificate, there will be only a single simple chain in the array.

member.name: CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT.cLowerQualityChainContext
member.summary: The number of chains in the rgpLowerQualityChainContext array.

member.name: CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT.rgpLowerQualityChainContext
member.summary: An array of pointers to CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT structures. Returned when CERT_CHAIN_RETURN_LOWER_QUALITY_CONTEXTS is set in dwFlags.

member.name: CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT.fHasRevocationFreshnessTime
member.summary: A Boolean value set to TRUE if dwRevocationFreshnessTime is available.

member.name: CERT_CHAIN_CONTEXT.dwRevocationFreshnessTime
member.summary: The largest CurrentTime, in seconds, minus the certificate revocation list's (CRL's) ThisUpdate of all elements checked.
